duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage special projects, create complex presentations, and manage executives' schedules
Receive and screen phone calls, review emails, and open/sort mail for leaders and team
Communicate calendar changes, prepare meeting agendas, and take meeting notes
Prepare presentation documents, support document organization and filing, and perform other assigned duties and responsibilities

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or a related field (Master's preferred)
